name: Cursor 2.0
tagline: Our first coding model and new interface for agents
description: Two big updates that make Cursor the best place to work with agents: our first coding model, Composer, and a new interface for working with many agents in parallel. Also included in this release: browser for Agent, voice mode, improved code review, and more!

name: Sentra by Dodo Payments
tagline: Monetize your software with prompts
description: Sentra is our AI Agent that integrates Billing & Payments by handling SDKs, APIs, Adapters, and plugs into your tech stack (Auth, DB etc). It extracts revenue insights such as growth drivers and takes customer actions like refunds, upgrades, and credits.

name: Peakflo AI Voice Agents
tagline: Human-like AI that automates business calls at scale
description: Meet Peakflo's AI Voice Agents – your humanlike, scalable, always-on team member that handles business ops calls, retains memory, triggers logic based actions and updates your system of record in real time.

name: Base44: The all-new builder
tagline: Entering a new era of Base44
description: A new era of Base44 where creating apps is smarter, faster, and more intuitive. The all-new builder doesn’t just code, it thinks: “What do I need to create this app?” and knows how to make it happen — through web search, smart file search, log inspection and data fetching. App building that understands context. Intelligence meets creation.

name: CodeBanana
tagline: Real-time coding collaboration, just like Google Docs
description: CodeBanana is Google Docs for development: real-time collaborative coding, project-aware AI that reads docs/repos, and sharable VMs with live URLs. Keep teams in sync and let non-technical members contribute to shipping software faster.

name: Gammacode
tagline: Web and Terminal agents that scan, fix, and ship secure code
description: Gammacode is an Web and Agentic CLI for SMBs and Developers to ship secure code faster. AI agents scan repos for vulnerabilities, then auto-fix security issues, bugs, and tech debt in secure sandboxes and through github actions reducing risks by 50%.

name: Airtop Agents
tagline: Create AI Web Agents with Just Words
description: Automate the web with plain English. Airtop Agents can log in, browse sites, extract data, connect to your tools, and complete workflows - no code, no APIs, no setup, just a simple conversation.

name: RollBot
tagline: 🤖 Turn images into gifs & videos quickly + privately
description: Create stunning reels, videos, gifs, slideshows, and more with RollBot - the lightning-fast reel creator.

name: NeverNap Pro
tagline: Keep your Mac awake
description: NeverNap Pro keeps your Mac awake when you need it most. Whether you're watching a movie, reading a document, or running a long task, NeverNap prevents your Mac from sleeping, dimming the display, or starting the screensaver.

name: Fabrica
tagline: Lovable for internal apps and dashboards
description: Fabrica connects to your internal databases and tooling and lets you build any kind of internal software (dashboards, apps, etc) by just chatting with AI.

name: CopyCat
tagline: Copy matching files by name instantly
description: Ever had to find 200 files buried inside 10,000? Copycat finds and copies files by name; automatically. Works for any file type, preserves metadata, saves you time. Its a one time purchase. No subscription. use it forever. includes all current and future updates. Available on Mac + Windows.

name: Pausa
tagline: Your space to breathe, reduce anxiety & stress, feel better
description: Pausa helps you find calm in chaos. A simple breathing app that guides you through science-based exercises to reduce stress, anxiety, and tension. No fluff—just breathe, feel better, and take control of your mind.

name: BookGraph
tagline: Visualize your reading network
description: Discover hidden patterns and connections in your reading journey through an interactive book relationship visualizer

name: gpt-oss-safeguard
tagline: Open safety reasoning models with custom safety policies
description: gpt-oss-safeguard is a new family of open-source safety models (120b & 20b) from OpenAI. They use reasoning to classify content based on a custom, developer-provided policy at inference time, providing an explainable chain-of-thought for each decision.

name: Promptacore
tagline: Your system for creating, managing and using AI prompts
description: Writing prompts shouldn’t take hours. With Promptacore, describe your task and let AI craft the perfect prompt. Organize everything in your Prompt Management System. Then use the Chrome Extension to apply, save, and optimize your prompts across your favorite websites.

name: Gatling AI Assistant for VS Code
tagline: AI-powered load testing, right inside your IDE
description: The Gatling AI Assistant for VS Code accelerates how developers create, explain, and optimize performance tests. Generate Gatling simulations in JavaScript, TypeScript, Scala, Java, or Kotlin, directly from your IDE. Understand and refine existing code with AI-powered insights. Stay in full control with a BYO-LLM model, supporting OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, and Azure OpenAI. Fast. Transparent. Developer-first.

name: Instict
tagline: The AI career coach that gets you hired
description: Instict is the AI career coach that gets you hired. It researches your target company, analyses your CV and role, and helps you practise with real interview questions tailored to you, so you sound confident, stand out, and land the job you deserve.

name: Smart Admin Assistant
tagline: Your all-in-one wp-admin toolkit — smarter, faster, cleaner.
description: Smart Admin Assistant turns your messy WordPress dashboard into the clean, organized workspace you've always dreamed of. Get 60+ smart features in 10 easy modules that let you customize everything, lock down security, speed things up, and manage content like a pro—zero coding needed!

name: LoveSketch
tagline: See the emotional reflection of your love.
description: LoveSketch reveals how your love feels — not just how it looks. Through intuitive questions, it creates an emotional reflection of your partner: the tone, rhythm, and depth of your shared love. Discover the archetype behind your connection 💫

name: Follower Snapshot
tagline: Follower count image generator to share on X and more
description: Generate high‑quality follower count images for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter/X and more. Share growth milestones, download clean social media graphics in seconds. Free tool with lifetime access option.

name: Cursor 2.0
tagline: Our first coding model and new interface for agents
description: Two big updates that make Cursor the best place to work with agents: our first coding model, Composer, and a new interface for working with many agents in parallel. Also included in this release: browser for Agent, voice mode, improved code review, and more!
